ISSUE.TITLE: Bug : Https scheme missing in swagger
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If the app is hosted with SSL scheme should be `https` in swagger but it only shows `http` scheme.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: add both schemes in swagger fix #311 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
